name: P.T Emulation 1.4
description:
I want to share with you the emulated and recreated P.T. directly from PS4 to PC. Each of us deserves to experience the scariest game of all time. Play for free now!

How to play:

Best played with a controller and headphones, for starting menu use mouse and click 'Back' to begin the game.

Controls:

Right click to zoom/examine objects or click right thumbstick on gamepad.

Disclaimer:

The original creator offered this for free on Itch then locked it behind a paywall once it gained popularity. He does not own the rights to the Silent Hill franchise nor it's assets to try and sell it for profit, therefore I have made the game available for free as it should be.  For any technical questions please direct them to https://twitter.com/arturlaczkowski

Thank you and enjoy!
